description:
Go behind the scene and flip through 60 pages of never-before-seen art while listening to 60 different tracks! Discover more information about characters, the process behind their creation with early sketches, concept art of buddies, characters and environments!

Spoiler alert! This product contains some spoilers regarding Born of Bread's story, browse at your own peril!

Note: Only available in English.
name: Born Of Bread Digital Artbook & OST
